headline: GTA Online
subtitle: One-Off Heist Bonuses
content:
Special Heist completion challenges are available, which can only be achieved once per person.

First Time – Complete each Heist Finale for the first time to net a bonus cash reward.
All In Order Challenge – Complete all 5 Heists in order to receive $1,000,000 cash.
Loyalty Challenge – Complete all 5 Heists with the same team to receive an additional $1,000,000.
Supporting Role – Complete all 5 Heists as a crew member to receive $100,000.
